extraction.outcome: relieving factors in reversible inguinal hernia
extraction.notes: Only medians and ranges reported. Before: median 2 (range 1–3); After: median 3 (all 3). Wilcoxon signed-rank z=3.391, P<0.001.

extraction.outcome: effective in the treatment of reversible inguinal hernia
extraction.notes: Overall effectiveness is concluded qualitatively from multiple symptom outcomes; no single numeric outcome directly labeled as 'effective in the treatment' is reported.

extraction.outcome: frequency of occurrence in reversible inguinal hernia
extraction.notes: Frequency measured as number of times hernia occurred in last two weeks. Before: median 12 (range 9–14, Q1=10, Q3=14, QD=2); After: median 2 (range 0–6, Q1=1, Q3=3, QD=1). Wilcoxon signed-rank z=−3.835, P<0.001.

extraction.outcome: symptoms of hernia such as heaviness, fullness and pain
extraction.notes: Article states yoga practices are useful in reducing symptoms such as heaviness, fullness and pain, but only pain intensity is quantified. Pain before: median 6 (range 3–8, Q1=5, Q3=7, QD=1); after: median 1 (range 0–3, Q1=0, Q3=2, QD=1). Wilcoxon signed-rank z=−3.864, P<0.001. No separate quantitative data for heaviness or fullness.

Pain measured on 0–10 numeric rating scale. Before: median 6 (range 3–8, Q1=5, Q3=7, QD=1); After: median 1 (range 0–3, Q1=0, Q3=2, QD=1). Wilcoxon signed-rank z=−3.864, P<0.001. Means and SDs not reported.

extraction.outcome: aggravating factors in reversible inguinal hernia
extraction.notes: Aggravating factors scored as count of present activities (0–5) among exercise/walking, bowel movement, bladder activity, lifting, coughing/sneezing. Before: median 4 (range 3–5, QD=0.5); After: median 1 (range 0–2, QD=0). Wilcoxon signed-rank z=−3.875, P<0.001.
